channel.title: Dress up for evaluation on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Dress up for evaluation on Game6r

item.title: 50/50 Hairstyles
item.description: No wonder emos are often so sad. What other mood can there be if the outfit is chosen completely tasteless! But you have a chance to correct this situation, and also just to see what things will look best on the representatives of this subculture. You even have balloons available as an accessory. And if you don’t know where to start, look at the options for ready-made costumes in the tips.

item.title: Bag Design Competition
item.description: I’ll tell you right away that “teenager” is a teenager, only in English. Here he, or rather her, you will dress up for a walk. After downloading the game, you need to wait a bit for the ads to pass. The gameplay itself is divided into two parts: makeup and clothing. You can switch between them completely freely. This will allow you to achieve an absolutely harmonious appearance of your character.

item.title: Cuties Candy Makeup
item.description: Mary is a girl with a camera that constantly blinds her eyes with a flash. And Melissa is not fragrant grass, but Mary’s friend. The girls got out to walk around the city and arrange a photo session against the backdrop of urban landscapes. Help them choose the most suitable outfits for each occasion. By the way, you can play together. Then you will dress up one of the girls, and your friend - the other.

item.title: Draculauras Blind Date
item.description: The meaning of this game is not only banal dress up. The toy is much more complicated than it might seem at first glance. First you need to choose a partner. The next step is to choose a suit for a date. Then you will need to prepare the interior, cook dinner and … hope that your virtual chosen one will like everything and he will not run away. Good luck!

item.title: Eliza Dressing Room
item.description: It is believed that during pregnancy a woman becomes more beautiful than ever in her life. This beauty can and should be emphasized by clothes. In addition, the wardrobe of the expectant mother during this period should be comfortable. It is in your power to create several options for such costumes. In the game, in addition to a huge selection of clothes, it is possible to experiment with the color of fabrics and lighting.

item.title: Geisha Make Up And Dress Up
item.description: In this game you will get to know Japanese geisha outfits. Who are the geishas - ask your mom and dad later, so as not to be distracted now from the fitting process. As you may have guessed, the task is to choose an interesting and harmonious Japanese-style costume. You can “attach” it to the landscapes in the background. In addition, during the game you will hear traditional Japanese music, which will undoubtedly only benefit.

item.title: Harley Quinn Hair And Makeup Studio
item.description: It’s worth saying right away that the drawing in this game is simply gorgeous! The smallest details of clothing, an interesting stylish background - all this adds to the game pluses. As well as a huge selection of Halloween costume details. Thanks to the last circumstance, you will be able to come up with any outfit for one of the four models (choice at the beginning of the game). When you’re done, don’t forget to save or print the picture.

item.title: Ice Skating Competition
item.description: During the game for girls Dress Up Beauty Contest you are waiting for the preparation of the model for the next performance. Use the provided wardrobe and choose from it those things that are most suitable for the young heroine of the game. If necessary, you can use the hint and admire the ready-made options.

item.title: Pirate Princess Halloween Dress Up
item.description: Did you know that among the famous pirates of past centuries there were women? Probably, one of them served as a prototype for the heroine of this game. You need to dress up a pirate girl for sea voyages and battles. To do this, on the mast on the left side of the screen there are icons of different departments of the wardrobe. Pick up the details of the pirate costume so that they fit together in the best way.

item.title: Princess of a Year
item.description: A game from our Chinese neighbors. This probably explains the size of the eyes and their shape in the main character of the game. However, this is not the main thing. The bottom line is that you need to dress up this beauty for dancing at the disco. At your disposal is a mountain of all kinds of clothes and jewelry. True, it is not immediately clear what and where to wear, as well as how these glasses will stay on the head of our dancer.

item.title: Princess Valentine Chaos
item.description: On the screen in front of you is a fashion model. We need to prepare her for work, that is, for a photo shoot on a Hawaiian beach. The entire right side of the screen is the tools and tools necessary for this. Switch at the top between sections and bring beauty. In this game, you can carefully work on the face, hair, clothes. If the music bothers you, you can turn it off.

item.title: Princesses Summer Swimming Competition
item.description: In this game you have to make a beautiful fashion model simply irresistible by turning her into a catwalk star. Start with makeup and hair. After you finish this section, move on to the wardrobe. The choice of clothes here is more than chic. It’s time to get confused and hang at the screen for a couple of hours. Pay attention to the small buttons at the bottom right near the model.

item.title: Whimsical Wedding Dressup
item.description: Quite a serious game, both in terms of its execution (quality of graphics, detailing), and in terms of the process itself. Let’s start with makeup. There are many tools in this section that will allow you to get creative with this part of the assignment. As for the choice of wedding dresses, jewelry and accessories, here gamers are also in for a little surprise: it will take a lot of time to review everything in detail.

item.title: Wonder Woman Movie
item.description: Have you ever read or heard fairy tales and legends about warrior princesses? Then you, for sure, will be familiar with the image of such a character. In our game you can create the heroine of your own fairy tale almost from scratch. To do this, you have a lot of hairstyles, weapons, chain mail dresses and other attributes of a warrior. At the end, do not forget to take a screenshot of the screen and save the picture to illustrate your own fairy tale.
